type.description: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc

typeCode.description: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown

issuedBy.description: Internet of logistics identity code of issuing party.

key.description: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

SLI_ID.description: Shipper's Letter of Instruction unique identifier

AvailabilityDateTime.description: Date and time of availability of goods for pickup at origin

DeliveryDateTime.description: Date and time at which the delivery is scheduled to take place

DocumentName.description: If no DocumentType provided, name of the referenced document

IncotermsCode.description: Standard code as defined by the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC)

WeightChargePaymentIndicator.description: Code indicating whether Weight / Valuation Charges  payment will be made at origin (PREPAID) or at destination (COLLECT)

OtherChargePaymentIndicator.description: Code indicating whether Other Charges payment will be made at origin (PREPAID) or at destination (COLLECT)

RoleCode.description: Company's role code - e.g. AA, AB...

RoleName.description: If no RoleCode provided, role name - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper

SecurityClassification.description: Security status - e.g. RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Aircraft Operator

IATAcargoAccreditationNumber.description: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier

IATAcargoCASSnumber.description: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier

IATAairlinePrefix.description: IATA three numeric airline prefix number

Description.description: Description of ID - e.g. PIMA address, Account number, VAT/Tax id, Legal Registration id…

Issuer.description: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO, IRS, FR VAT, DE VAT, CCS…

RoleCode.description: Company's role code - e.g. AA, AB...

RoleName.description: If no RoleCode provided, role name - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper

SecurityClassification.description: Security status - e.g. RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Aircraft Operator

IATAcargoAccreditationNumber.description: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier

IATAcargoCASSnumber.description: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier

IATAairlinePrefix.description: IATA three numeric airline prefix number

Issuer.description: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO, IRS, FR VAT, DE VAT, CCS…

IATAcargoAccreditationNumber.description: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier

IATAcargoCASSnumber.description: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier

IATAairlinePrefix.description: IATA three numeric airline prefix number

Description.description: Description of ID - e.g. PIMA address, Account number, VAT/Tax id, Legal Registration id…

Issuer.description: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO, IRS, FR VAT, DE VAT, CCS…

RoleCode.description: Company's role code - e.g. AA, AB...

RoleName.description: If no RoleCode provided, role name - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper

SecurityClassification.description: Security status - e.g. RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Aircraft Operator

IATAcargoAccreditationNumber.description: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier

IATAcargoCASSnumber.description: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier

IATAairlinePrefix.description: IATA three numeric airline prefix number

Description.description: Description of ID - e.g. PIMA address, Account number, VAT/Tax id, Legal Registration id…

Issuer.description: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO, IRS, FR VAT, DE VAT, CCS…

Code.description: Special handling code following IATA standards

Description.description: If no Code provided, special handling description

LineType.description: Line type - e.g. ITM for Item, PCK for Packing, FRT for Freight charge, INS for Insurance charge for invoice charges breakdown

SubTotalAmount.description: Product subtotal before discount and tax - CALCULATED: Quantity x UnitPrice / QuantityForUnitPrice

BeforeDiscountAmount.description: Amount on which the discount is calculated - CALCULATED:  = SubTotalAmount

Amount.description: Discount amount - CALCULATED: BeforeDiscountAmount x Percent

Description.description: Discount reason description - e.g. Christmas Sale

SubTotalDiscountAmount.description: Total discount amount for this line - CALCULATED: Discount Amount + Discount OtherAmount

BeforeTaxAmount.description: Amount on which tax is applied - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - SubTotalDiscountAmount

Category.description: Tax category - e.g. StandardRate, Exempt from Tax (and by implication, the rate that applies, the actual percentage is dependent on the tax jurisdiction)

SubTotalTaxAmount.description: Tax amount - CALCULATED: BeforeTaxAmount x Tax Percent

SubTotalLineAmount.description: Total line amount after discount and tax - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - SubTotalDiscountAmount + SubTotalTaxAmount

CustomsTransitStatus.description: Customs transit status / information / reference / code / SCI code

CustomsSubjectCode.description: Customs subject code - e.g. IMP for import, EXP for export, AGT for Agent, ISS for The Regulated Agent Issuing the Security Status for a Consignment etc.  At least one of the three elements (Country Code, Information Identifier or Customs, Security and Regulatory Control Information Identifier) must be completed

CustomsContentCode.description: Customs content code - e.g. Item Number I, Exemption Legend L, System Downtime Reference S, Unique Consignment Reference Number U, Movement Reference Number M

SecurityStatusDate.description: Date and time when the Security Status was issued

RegulatedEntity.description: Company and person details issuing the security status - e.g. with COMPANY SecurityClassifcication as RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Authorized Operator / Account Consignor

ReceivedFrom.description: Known Consignor or Account Consignor reference

ScreeningMethod.description: Screening methods which have been used to secure the cargo - e.g. VCK

OtherScreeningMethods.description: Other methods used to secure the cargo

AdditionalSecurityInformation.description: Ad hoc security statement required by state regulators

PayingParty.description: Party covering the insurance - e.g. Consignor, Consignee, Freight Forwarder…

InsurancePolicyHolder.description: Insurance policy holder details and contacts

InsuredAmount.description: Insured amount - amount covered by the insurance policy

Charge.description: Insurance charge - e.g. amount billed by the insurance company for the insurance policy

NoCarriageValue.description: NVD (No Value Declared) indicator when no value is declared for carriage

NoCustomsValue.description: NCV (No Customs Value) indicator when no value is declared for customs

NoInsuranceValue.description: XXX indicator when no value is declared for insurance

FlagScheduledEstimatedActual.description: Flag to indicate whether this line is scheduled, estimated or actual (=performed)

DateTime.description: Date and time of the event

SequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of the event / movement for this piece

EventCode.description: Event or status code - e.g. DEP, ARR, RCS…

EventName.description: If no EventCode provided, event name - e.g. Loading, Unloading…

ServiceCode.description: Code to identify cargo products / service invoiced by carrier / freight forwarder

CarriageStage.description: Carriage stage - e.g. Pre-Carriage, Main-Carriage, On-Carriage. Always defaults to Main-Carriage

ModeCode.description: Mode of transport code following UNECE Recommendation N. 19 - Code for Modes of Transport

DataAcceptanceStatus.description: Status of data - e.g. Received, Processed, Accepted, Rejected

DataValidationStatus.description: Validation status of data - e.g. Acknowledged (data OK), Warning (error detected and corrected), Error (error detected)

DataErrorCode.description: MIP (Message Improvement Program) Error / Warning code

DataErrorDescription.description: If no ErrorCode provided, Error / Warning description

ErrorType.description: Type of error - e.g from the Message Improvement Program (MIP)

FieldPath.description: Field path from the root of the message / document  - e.g. EVENT.TransportDetails.OtherDetails

TransportID.description: Airline flight number or rail / truck / maritime line id

RegistrationID.description: Vehicle identification - e.g. vehicle registration number

Type.description: Vehicle or container type following United Nations Directories for Electronic Data Interchange Code List

Size.description: Size of the vehicle - free text

SpaceAllocationDetails.description: Space allocation request / action / confirmation code or details

DeckPosition.description: Position of the shipment in the aircraft - e.g. lower or main deck

DeviceName.description: Data logger's name - e.g. data logger manufacturer's brand and model

MeasurementParameter.description: Parameter that is being measured - e.g. temperature, humidity, location…

ThresholdMinValue.description: Minimum alert threshold to trigger warning if measurement falls below this level

ThresholdMaxValue.description: Maximum alert threshold to trigger warning if measurement exceeds this level

ThresholdMinAction.description: Free text - action to trigger if measured value falls below the ThresholdMinValue

ThresholdMaxAction.description: Free text - action to trigger if measured value exceeds the ThresholdMaxValue

ThresholdNotification.description: Company or person contact details for notification in case of value excursion

Geolocation.description: Location details - e.g. geographic coordinates from GPS
